text: Healthcare affordability is a pressing issue that affects us all. As a centrist, I believe in finding solutions that balance individual freedom with collective responsibility. TailorMed's approach to healthcare affordability, as highlighted in the Healthcare Rethink podcast, is a great example of how we can create a more sustainable and equitable system. By leveraging analytics and technology, TailorMed's Affordability Network can help reduce financial toxicity for patients and improve healthcare outcomes. It's time for us to rethink healthcare and work towards a future where everyone has access to affordable, high-quality care.
